Minimum of two major radio production studios and control
rooms equipped for all facets of public and instructional
radio program production. Included are a variety of "talk"
programs, small music groups, ensembles and individual per¬
formers, dramatic productions and experimental activity in¬
cluding a "classroom of the air" in one studio. Stereo
capability required for music and dramatic productions.
An operational facility providing the capacity to originate,
operate and switch a live interconnected educational radio
network functioning eight hours daily.
